FuncDef: The reset pppoe statistics command clears statistics about PPPoE packets.

ParaDef.Info:
Clears statistics about PPPoE packets on a specified interface. interface-type interface-number specifies the interface type and number.
The value is a string of 1 to 256  case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Clears statistics about PPPoE packets on a board in a specified slot.
The value is a string of 1 to 16  case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If you need to collect statistics about PPPoE packets and authentication messages over a period of time, run the reset pppoe statistics command to clear the existing statistics first.
Precautions
This command is supported only on the admin VS.
After the reset pppoe statistics command is run, the statistics about PPPoE packets are cleared and cannot be restored. Exercise caution when running the command.
